author: bryanduxbury
msg: HBASE-603 When an exception bubbles out of getRegionServerWithRetries, wrap the exception with a RetriesExhaustedException
-HTable now throws REE when retries run out

author: ruwan
msg: Fixing the issue, SYNAPSE-277. Now the client repo and the axis2.xml can be configured using the callout mediator configuration itself. You can add the following element to configure these properties;
but these are optional and if not provided, will be taken the values hardcoded earlier as defualt values. This keeps the backward compatibility as well
